NovaMind Platinum is for power Mind Mappers, people who need to make powerful presentations, screenwriters, project planners, business consultants, serious business people, and the people who need the absolute best.

Platinum comes with the NovaMind Presenter - a powerful presentation feature that will leave your audience amazed with the highly professional presentations from within NovaMind. In the Mac version, it allows you to glide over your Mind Map, zooming in to the branches. In the Windows version, it highlights the branches and automatically expands children branches as necessary to show the detailed information. In the Windows version, it allows you to give interactive presentations, expanding and contracting branches as required.

The screenwriting module has just been completely rewritten to take into account the many feature requests of our screenwriter users.
There are extensive features for adding task related information to your Mind Map, and reporting on the information that is there. You can add your own custom information to branches.

*** System requirements for this download: ***
Apple Mac running OS 10.3.9+ (10.4 or later recommended).
60MB of available hard disk space for NovaMind, and an additional 30MB if the Branch Proposal System is installed. Extra space is required for the graphics libraries.
